org.restsql.core.impl

Class TriggerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restsql.core.impl.TriggerManager

  • public class TriggerManager
extends Object
    Manages trigger instantiation and execution. Triggers are defined in a properties file, whose location is referenced in the restSQL properties file.
    Author:
    Mark Sawers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TriggerManager()

      static void executeTriggers(String sqlResource, Request request, boolean before)
      Executes all trigger defined for the resource.

    • Method Detail

      • executeTriggers

        public static void executeTriggers(String sqlResource,
                   Request request,
                   boolean before)
                            throws SqlResourceException
        Executes all trigger defined for the resource.
        Parameters:
        sqlResource - SqlResource name
        request - restSQL request
        before - true if before execution; false if after execution
        Throws:
        SqlResourceException - if a trigger exception is thrown or database error occurs
